Sentencas: The use of active layers is a promising strategy to improve the properties of air electrodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers

Sentencas: In this work, La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta is combined with different oxide ion conductors Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95, Bi1.5Y0.5O3 and Pr6O11 to form highly efficient nanocomposite active layers in a single step by spray-pyrolysis deposition.
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers

Sentencas: One of the main advantages of these nanocomposite layers is that the nanoscale microstructure is retained at relatively high sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers

Sentencas: As a consequence, the interfacial area between the electrode and the electrolyte increases significantly, leading to fast oxide ion transport at the interface, as well as more active sites for the electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers

Sentencas: An exhaustive structural, microstructural, and electrochemical characterization of the layers are performed to evaluate their potential use in SOFCs.
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers

Sentencas: The incorporation of a La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (LSM-CGO) interlayer decreases the polarization resistance of LSM cathode from 1.71 to 0.46 Omega cm(2) at 700 degrees C. Moreover, a single cell with LSM-CGO interlayer generates a peak power density of 1.20 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C compared to 0.79 W cm(-2) for the same cell without active layer.
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers

Sentencas: These results demonstrate the great benefits of using nanocomposite layers to improve the properties of air electrodes.
Titulo: Boosting the Performance of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Electrodes by The Incorporation of Nanocomposite Active Layers
